general_info.summary: This text lists various sources of information used for university assessment and evaluation, including annual reports, media rankings derived from questionnaires and surveys, benchmarking based on feedback from students, alumni, faculty, employers, and parents, and the QS I-Gauge rating.
general_info.raw_content:
• Annual reports of the University
• Ranking by Media House(s) conducted through questionnaire and/or surveys
• Benchmarking through student/alumni/faculty/employer/parent feedbacks
• QS I-Gauge – Rating
Source: https://www.sharda.ac.in/iqac/
